description: Two suspicious butchers observe a dog wearing a trench coat and fedora standing silently in front of their meat counter. The irony stems from the butchers treating the anthropomorphic dog like a potential human shoplifter or spy, rather than a non-customer animal. The setting is a butcher shop displaying cuts of meat including sirloin and ground round. Hanging carcasses, one resembling a chicken, are also visible in the background. The humor arises from the absurd notion of a dog loitering suspiciously in a place where its natural interest in the product is misconstrued as criminal intent.
caption: “Keep your eye on that guy. ... He hasn’t said or bought a thing for over an hour.”
